# MarshalStream.Length property

Gets the length of the stream. The stream must wrap a fixed buffer or a seekable stream.

```csharp
public override long Length { get; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| ObjectDisposedException | The stream is disposed. |
